item.description:
Happy Holidays Incubators!!

First off a big holiday thanks for coming on out this year and continuing to laugh, play, and improvise!

Second, I wanted to apoligize to anyone who showed up last week and wasn't sure what was up. I was involved in directing a show that night and didn't get a message out in time saying to show up and play some games without me or Nikki who was sick. Sounds like you all stilll had a fun time though!

Onto this evening, I've been a bit under the weather as well but feeling a bit more chipper today, I thought it would be great to sneak an incubator in.

So everyone knows what a flash mob is right? So let's make tonight a Flash Incubator! Come on out, let's play, let's laugh, let's relax.

As always no improv or acting experience required.

Please RSVP so I know how many of you to expect!

We'll go through a great mix of warm ups, exercises, and games!

Any questions? Let me know!

Cheers!

Jason
item.name: Flash Incubator! Rudolph the Red Nosed Incubator!! Come rock it out tonight!
